channel.title: [PI] Pming Help [PI]
channel.description:
I'm using a 317 PI.
I do not know if this is server or client sided so if this is in the wrong section, I'll be happy to move it or get it moved.
My problem is, when a staff like a mod or admin, pms someone, the crowns get mixed up. For owners and donor the ranks work just fine. Its just a mod's pm will show a donor sign and an admin will have a mod crown shown.
This only is a problem in pming. In clan chat or normal chat it is fine. Some help on fixing this guys? Thanks.

item.title: [PI] Pming Help [PI]
item.dc:creator: @igli igli
item.description:
@igli wrote:

Liam Baby:

I’m having the same problem, I think it’s server sided in the PlayerAssistant

If you fix it, let me know please. I’ll do the same as well.

Read full topic

item.title: [PI] Pming Help [PI]
item.dc:creator: @Mini_Guy_123 Mini Guy 123
item.description:
@Mini_Guy_123 wrote:

Search for the sprite ID of the crowns and look for one that isn’t correct with the rank of the player.

Read full topic
